vernac_cmds: Definition stack_subst (s: stack A val) (sub: subst) : stack A val := fun x => sub x s.
Definition apply_subst {B} (e : (A -> val) -> B) (sub : subst) : (A -> val) -> B := fun s => e (stack_subst s sub).
Definition subst0 : subst := fun x => stack_get x.
Definition subst1 e x : subst := fun x' => if x' ?[ eq ] x then e else stack_get x'.
Definition subst1_trunc e x : subst := fun x' => if x' ?[ eq ] x then e else empty_open.
Fixpoint substl_aux (subs: substlist) : subst := match subs with | nil => subst0 | cons (x,e) subs' => fun x' => if x' ?[ eq ] x then e else substl_aux subs' x' end.
Fixpoint substl_trunc_aux (subs: substlist) : subst := match subs with | nil => fun _ => empty_open | cons (x,e) subs' => fun x' => if x' ?[ eq ] x then e else substl_trunc_aux subs' x' end.
Definition substl es v := substl_aux es v.
Definition substl_trunc es v := substl_trunc_aux es v.
Notation "g [{ e // x }]" := (apply_subst g (subst1 e x)) (at level 9, e at level 39, format "g [{ e // x }]") : open_scope.
Notation "g [{ e //! x }]" := (apply_subst g (subst1_trunc e x)) (at level 9, e at level 39, format "g [{ e //! x }]") : open_scope.
Notation " g '//' es " := (apply_subst g (substl es)) (at level 40) : open_scope.
Notation " g '//!' es " := (apply_subst g (substl_trunc es)) (at level 40) : open_scope.
Context {A val : Type} {Heq : RelDec (@eq A)} {HeqOk : RelDec_Correct Heq}.
Lemma open_subst_stack {B} (m: @open A val B) (sub : subst) (s : @stack A val) : (apply_subst m sub) s = m (stack_subst s sub).
Lemma subst0_id B (g: @open A val B) : (apply_subst g (@subst0 A val)) = g.
Lemma subst1_stack (s: @stack A val) e x : stack_subst s (subst1 e x) = stack_add x (e s) s.
Lemma substl_subst1 x e : substl (val := val) (cons (x,e) nil) = subst1 e x.
Lemma substl_subst1_trunc x e : substl_trunc (cons (x,e) nil) = subst1_trunc e x.
Lemma subst1_stack_add {B} (p : open B) (e : expr) (x : A) (v : val) (s : @stack A val) : p[{e//x}] (stack_add x v s) = p[{e[{V_expr v//x}]//x}] s.
Lemma stack_add_var (x : A) (s : @stack A val) (v : val) : (stack_get x) (stack_add x v s) = v.
Lemma subst1_val (v : val) (e : open val) (x : A) : (V_expr v)[{e//x}] = (V_expr v).
Lemma subst_identity {B} (x : A) (s : @stack A val) (p : open B) : p[{(V_expr (s x))//x}] s = p s.
consider (y ?[ eq ] x); intro; subst; reflexivity.
Lemma substl_trunc_notin x' xs es : ~ In x' xs -> substl_trunc (combine xs es) x' = @empty_open _ val _.
Lemma subst1_trunc_singleton_stack {B} (p : open B) (s : @stack A val) x y : p[{(stack_get y) //! x}] s = p (stack_add x (s y) (stack_empty A val)).
Context {A val : Type} {Heq : RelDec (@eq A)} {HeqOk : RelDec_Correct Heq}.
Lemma subst_singleton {B} : forall x e (P : @open A val B), P[{e//x}] = P // (cons (x, e) nil).
Lemma subst_open_expr_nil {B} : forall (e : @open A val B), (e // nil) = e.
Lemma subst_var_cons_eq : forall (x:A) es (e : expr (val := val)), (stack_get x // (cons (x, e) es)) = e.
Lemma subst_var_cons_ineq : forall (x:A) y es (e : expr (val := val)) (Hneq: x <> y), (stack_get x // (cons (y, e) es)) = (stack_get x // es).
intros x y es e Hneq.
Lemma val_expr_substs : forall (v : val) es, ((V_expr v) // es) = (V_expr v).
Definition subst_substlist (es fs : @substlist A val) : substlist := map (fun x => (fst x, (snd x) // fs)) es.
Lemma subst_combine {B} (e : @open A val B) (es fs : substlist) : (e // es // fs) = (e // (app (subst_substlist es fs) fs)).
consider (x ?[ eq ] a); intros; subst; simpl.
Context {A val : Type} {Heq : RelDec (@eq A)} {HeqOk : RelDec_Correct Heq}.
Definition subst_fresh (vs: A -> val) (xs: list A) : subst := fun x' => if (List.anyb (rel_dec x')) xs then V_expr (vs x') else stack_get x'.
Fixpoint subst_fresh_l (vs: A -> val) (xs: list A) : list (@expr A val) := match xs with | nil => nil | cons x xs' => cons (V_expr (vs x)) (subst_fresh_l vs xs') end.
Lemma subst_fresh_alt (vs: A -> val) (xs: list A) : subst_fresh vs xs = substl (combine xs (subst_fresh_l vs xs)).

command: consider (y ?[ eq ] x); intro; subst; reflexivity.
intros x y es e Hneq.
consider (x ?[ eq ] a); intros; subst; simpl.
